target: There are 10 hotels which you might like. Would you like staying at Ac Hotel By Marriott Paris Porte Maillot, which has a 4.3 rating?
context: <user>  I want to have some fun, so can you tell me about some attractions I can visit? <system>  Which is the location where I should look in for attractions? <user>  I want to know about attraction in Paris, and more specifically I am interested in a Museum kind of attraction. <system>  You might enjoy visit Choco-Story Paris - Musee du Chocolat, which is a Museum. <user>  Can you tell me if the entrance is free at this attraction? What phone number can I use to contact them? <system>  Unfortunately, the entrance is not free. If you want to call them you can through 1 42 29 68 60. <user>  Alright, that's good, but are there some other attractions? I will have my kids with me, so I am looking for something which is child-friendly. <system>  There are 9 attractions which match your request. You can consider visiting Cinematheque Francaise, which is a Museum.<user>  Alright, nice. I will need one room in a hotel there then. <system>
